1123326864548945920.text:
Q2 Apple:

* iPhone revenue (bad): $31b (-18%, $38b last year). 
* Services revenue (very good): $11.5b (+25%, $9.2b last year)
* Overall revenue: $58b (-5$, $61.1b last year)

Guidance for Q3 2018:

* $52.5-54.5b (pretty much as last year: $53.3b)
